chn: 将选择的道具放置原地
将选择的道具大量放置原地
请选择要大量放置原地的道具
请选择要大量丢弃的道具

eng: Leave selected number of items here
chn: 将指定数量的道具放置原地

eng: Take out selected number of items

chn: 确认配置内容，前往下一个画面
将所有配置恢复为默认

eng: Select an item to interact with

chn: 配置镜头上下移动控制
配置镜头左右移动控制

eng: Camera reset also resets the camera y-axis
chn: 重置镜头时，是否恢复默认角度

eng: Set auto lock-on to new target when former target dies
chn: 锁定目标死亡时，是否自动更换锁定目标

eng: Automatically target an enemy when attacking with no lock
chn: 未锁定目标时，是否自动锁定攻击目标

eng: Set whether the camera automatically avoids walls
chn: 镜头触碰墙壁时，是否自动避开

eng: Allows for manual control of aiming of large weapons when locked-on
chn: 配置装备大型武器锁定目标后，攻击时是否能手动变更方向

eng: Decide whether to prioritize visual quality or frame rate
chn: 配置画面品质着重于画质或帧率

eng: Switch depiction of blood on or off, or set to mild
Switch in-game subtitles on or off
Configure how in-game HUD is displayed
chn: 配置是否显示各种量表

eng: Configure cinematic effects used during special attacks
chn: 使出特殊攻击时，是否呈现特殊运镜

eng: Set automatic camera rotation for left/right movement
chn: 角色左右移动时，镜头是否自行转动

eng: Adjust image quality when HDR is enabled
chn: 开启高动态范围成像（ＨＤＲ）时的画质调整
配置开启／关闭高动态范围成像（ＨＤＲ）
与所在区域外的联机玩家配对配置

eng: Edit to match with players using the same password
chn: 编辑配对暗号，只有完全符合的玩家才能成功配对

eng: Choose whether or not to display other players' names
chn: 配置其他玩家的名称显示方式

eng: Choose whether to launch the game in online or offline mode
chn: 配置以联机游玩／脱机游玩开始游戏

eng: Block your summon sign in worlds with adversaries present
chn: 其他世界中如果有敌对者，可以限制不显示自己的召唤记号

eng: Review and update your consent to the data usage agreement
chn: 配置是否同意游戏分析

eng: Save the game and return to title menu
chn: 保存游戏进度，返回标题画面

eng: Set keys to assign to actions
chn: 配置采取各项动作时对应的按键
根据使用的装置，配置操作指示显示的按键

eng: Set whether tutorials will be shown or not
Set mouse sensitivity for camera movement
chn: 配置鼠标操作镜头时的灵敏度

eng: Set horizontal camera controls with the mouse
chn: 配置鼠标操作镜头时的左右移动

eng: Set vertical camera controls with the mouse
chn: 配置鼠标操作镜头时的上下移动

eng: Set the screen mode in which to launch the game
chn: 配置以全屏幕或窗口化启动游戏

eng: Set whether to simplify rendering in the case of reduced performance
chn: 配置是否于效能低下时简化渲染效果
选择屏幕空间环境光遮蔽的品质
选择光影细部呈现的品质
请选择想成长的能力值
请选择想成长的能力值

eng: Select an armament to enhance with Ashes of War
chn: 请选择要使用战灰的武器

eng: Select an Ash of War to apply
Select an affinity to grant to this armament
chn: 请选择武器要赋予的属性

eng: Select a slot to hold a Great Rune
chn: 请选择要寄宿大卢恩的空格
请选择要记忆的魔法、祷告

eng: Choose which dragon ability to make thine own
chn: 请选择龙的力量，将其力量化为己有

eng: Select Ashes of War to duplicate
Select which remembrance to plumb for power
chn: 请选择要使用的追忆，将其力量化为己有

eng: Select power to draw from remembrance
chn: 请选择想从追忆获得的力量
请选择要调配的结晶露滴

eng: Select the site of grace where you wish to go
chn: 请选择想传送过去的赐福

eng: Select the site of grace where you wish to go
chn: 请选择想传送过去的赐福

eng: Select item to store in chest
chn: 请选择要收纳至木箱的道具

eng: Select item to take from chest
chn: 请选择要从木箱拿出的道具
请选择想更动配置的动作

eng: Press the key you want to assign to this action
chn: 请按下想配置成的按键
在移动时按下，能慢步移动

eng:
Press while standing still to backstep.
Press while moving for a dodge roll, or hold to dash.
chn:
在静止状态按下能后跃
移动时按下能翻滚，按住不放能冲刺
能切换站立、蹲下的动作

eng:
Move the camera up.
Change target upwards during lock-on.
chn: 能向上移动镜头，锁定时能向上切换目标

eng:
Move the camera down.
Change target downwards during lock-on.
chn: 能向下移动镜头，锁定时能向下切换目标

eng:
Move the camera to the left.
Change target to the left during lock-on.
chn: 能向左移动镜头，锁定时能向左切换目标

eng:
Move the camera to the right.
Change target to the right during lock-on.
chn: 能向右移动镜头，锁定时能向右切换目标

eng:
Reset the camera's position.
Turn lock-on fixation on or off during lock-on.
chn:
能重置镜头
画面中有可以锁定的目标时，能锁定／解除锁定目标

eng: Change your selected sorcery or incantation
Normal attack with your right-hand armament
chn: 用右手武器使出轻攻击

eng: Strong attack with your right-hand armament. Hold to charge the attack.
chn: 用右手武器使出重攻击，按住不放能蓄力攻击

eng:
Wield your right-hand armament in both hands.
Hold to wield your left-hand armament in both hands instead.
chn:
双手共持右手武器
按住不放能双手共持左手武器

eng: Select a base for creating your character
chn: 请选择想使用的角色雏形

eng: Save present settings as a favorite
Start over with a new appearance
chn: 结束化妆，化为新的外貌

eng: Start over with a new appearance
chn: 结束化妆，化为新的外貌

eng: Select face similar to present face
chn: 选择与目前相似的脸型

eng: Set whether to display burn marks
chn: 配置是否显示烫伤伤痕
调整眉毛根部的漆黑度

eng: Adjust quantity of white eyebrow hairs

chn: 调整胡子根部的漆黑度

eng: Adjust quantity of white facial hair
Adjust opacity of right eye clouding
chn: 调整右眼水晶体的混浊程度

eng: Adjust color of right eye clouding
chn: 编辑右眼水晶体混浊部分的颜色

eng: Adjust color of right eye white
Adjust right eye's distance from the center of the face
chn: 调整右眼虹膜距离脸中心的位置

eng: Adjust opacity of left eye clouding
chn: 调整左眼水晶体的混浊程度

eng: Adjust color of left eye clouding
chn: 编辑左眼水晶体混浊部分的颜色

eng: Adjust color of left eye white
Adjust left eye's distance from the center of the face
chn: 调整左眼虹膜距离脸中心的位置
是否套用变化后的眼睛配置

eng: Adjust darkness of bags under eyes
Adjust the color of bags under eyes
Adjust eyeshadow darkness on upper eyelid
Adjust eyeshadow color on upper eyelid
Adjust eyeshadow darkness on lower eyelid
Adjust eyeshadow color on lower eyelid

Buff body
Body type has no bearing on ability
chn:
强壮的体型
体型与能力高低无关

eng:
Slender body
Body type has no bearing on ability
chn:
纤细的体型
体型与能力高低无关

eng:
Young
Age only affects appearance,
has no bearing on ability
chn:
年轻时期的外貌
外貌与能力高低无关

eng:
Mature
Age only affects appearance,
has no bearing on ability
chn:
壮年时期的外貌
外貌与能力高低无关

eng:
Aged
Age only affects appearance,
has no bearing on ability
chn:
年迈时期的外貌
外貌与能力高低无关
年轻时期的声音，第一种
壮年时期的声音，第一种
年迈时期的声音，第一种
年轻时期的声音，第二种
壮年时期的声音，第二种
年迈时期的声音，第二种

eng:
A knight exiled from their homeland to
wander. A solid, armor-clad origin.
chn:
受祖国放逐的流浪骑士
身穿金属盔甲，稳如泰山

eng:
A nomad warrior who fights wielding two
blades at once. An origin of exceptional
technique.
chn:
游牧民族的双刀剑士
身手十分灵巧

eng:
A stalwart hero, at home with a battleaxe,
descended from a badlands chieftain.
chn:
挥舞战斧的强壮勇者
据说是蛮荒地王者的后代

eng:
A dangerous bandit who strikes for
weak points. Excels at ranged combat
with bows.
chn:
专挑致命一击攻击的危险盗贼
会用弓箭，能进行远距离攻击

eng:
A scholar who reads fate in the stars.
Heir to the school of glintstone sorcery.
chn:
试图从星星找寻命运的人物
继承了辉石魔法

eng:
A seer ostracized for inauspicious
prophecies. Well-versed in healing
incantations.
chn:
做出不祥的预言
因此受到迫害的预言家
会使用恢复类的祷告

eng:
A capable fighter from the distant Land of
Reeds. Handy with katana and longbows.
chn:
来自与外隔绝的异国
芦苇之地的武士
擅于用刀与长弓的战士

eng:
A prisoner bound in an iron mask. Studied
in glintstone sorcery, having lived among
the elite prior to sentencing.
chn:
受判重刑，戴着铁面具的囚犯
原本似乎出身上流社会
会使用辉石魔法

eng:
A church spy adept at covert operations.
Equally adept with a sword as they are
with their incantations.
chn:
擅于暗地行动的教会密使
使用剑术与祷告，相辅相成

eng:
A poor, purposeless sod, naked as the day
they were born. A nice club is all they have.
chn:
不知缘故，但裸着身体的人物
身上只带着棍棒

eng:
No keepsake. The past has been well and
truly left behind.
chn:
没有遗物
将过去的一切留在故乡

eng:
A medallion inlaid with crimson amber.
Increases maximum HP.
chn:
镶有红色琥珀的链坠
能提升血量的上限

eng:
The gold of grace shining in the eyes of
the people of the Lands Between.
Use to gain many runes.
chn:
蕴藏在交界地居民眼中的赐福
残存下来的黄金碎屑
使用后能获得大量卢恩

eng:
A golden seed washed ashore from the
Lands Between. Said to reinforce
Sacred Flasks.
chn:
从交界地漂流而来的黄金种子
据说可以用在强化圣杯瓶

eng:
The ashes of small, diminutive golems.
Ashes are said to hold spirits within.
chn:
娇小魔像们的骨灰
据说有灵魂寄宿其中

eng:
Three strange cracked pots that somehow
mend themselves. A container for certain
thrown items.
chn:
即使坏掉也会复原，神奇的壶（３个）
是投掷壶类道具的容器

eng:
Two stone keys shaped like swords.
Breaks the seal on imp statues, but can only be used once.
chn:
参考剑的外型设计的石制钥匙（２把）
据说能解开小恶魔像的封印
但使用后会损坏

eng:
Five sacred branches charged with beguiling
power. Said to originate from the
demigod Miquella.
chn:
能够魅惑敌人的神圣树枝（５枝）
据说起源来自半神米凯拉

eng:
Five pieces of boiled prawn.
Boosts physical damage negation.
chn:
煮熟的虾子肉（５个）
一定时间内，提升物理减伤率

eng:
The crazed likeness of a noble whose eyes have been gouged out.
Attracts enemies' aggression.
chn:
被众人压碎双眼的男性疯狂肖像
将变得容易受敌人攻击

eng: Do not mirror tattoos and marks

chn: 使用变化后的眼睛配置
不使用变化后的眼睛配置

eng:
The most common face among the Tarnished.
After all, they were all warriors once.
chn:
褪色者之中最常见的外貌
在过去，褪色者都是战士

eng:
The face of an austere pilgrim.
There are many roads to truth.
chn:
禁欲求道者的外貌
他们追求的道，不尽相同

eng:
A regal face found among those who claim
noble blood in the Lands Between.
chn:
自称继承交界地贵族血统的人
所拥有的外貌

eng:
Face found among a proud and seclusive
tribe of folk well-versed in ancient
legends and heresies alike.
chn:
遗世独立的家族拥有的外貌
与古老传说、异端有所关联

eng:
A face found among the hardy people
of the unforgiving north. Some say
they're descended from giants.
chn:
北方荒凉大地居民的外貌
据说他们是巨人的后代

eng:
The face of one who wanders the seas in
search of their home in the Lands Between.
chn:
在茫茫大海中徘徊
遍寻故乡交界地所在的水手
所拥有的外貌

eng:
A face from the faraway, isolated Land
of Reeds, where blood is a familiar sight.
chn:
与外隔绝的异国
芦苇之地居民的外貌
那片土地充斥着血腥

eng:
The stony face of the people of the
ancient dragons, among whom life
is typically short.
chn:
拥有岩石皮肤的人拥有的外貌
古龙的子民大多短命

eng:
The features of those known as
Nightfolk. Few in number, they were
said to bleed silver long ago.
chn:
人称夜人的少数人拥有的外貌
传说他们有着银色血液

eng:
The face of the Numen, supposed
descendants of denizens of another
world. Long-lived but seldom born.
chn:
人称异界居民的后代，稀人的外貌
很长寿，然而诞生的人数非常之少

The most common face among the Tarnished.

chn:
褪色者之中最常见的外貌

请选择要使用的肢体动作
